clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Preventive Treatment With Symbicort or Budicort Turbohaler in Childhood Asthma Return to School Epidemic
clinical_study.official_title: Childhood Asthma and Return to School: the September Epidemic Exacerbation in Israel.A Controlled Trial of the Effectiveness of Preventive Treatment With Symbicort or Budicort Turbuhaler

brief_summary.textblock: During the second week of September( week 38 of the year)there are recorded data of exacerbation of asthma all over the world, including Israel. A short preventive treatment of 6 weeks may reduce asthma exacerbation in children,reduce primary care and ER visiting and hospitalization.

detailed_description.textblock:
During the second week of September( week 38 of the year)there are recorded data of exacerbation of asthma all over the world, including Israel. A short preventive treatment of 6 weeks may reduce asthma exacerbation in children,reduce primary care and ER visiting and hospitalization.
We will study the effectiveness of Budicort or Symbicort turbuhaler as a preventive treatment in children aged 6-18 years.

primary_outcome.measure: reduction of asthma exacerbation during the study period

secondary_outcome.description: less primary care physician visits less ER visits less hospitalization due to asthma exacerbation

arm_group.description: 75 children will receive treatment with Budicort 200 mcg
75 children will receive treatment with Symbicort 160 mcg
75 children who will not treated as their request but will be folowedup

intervention.description: Budesonide 200 mcg turbuhaler or Budesonide+Formoterol 160mcg turbuhaler

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
age : 6-18 years suffering from asthma asthma exacerbation during 1/9/2009-15/10/2009
Exclusion Criteria:
any chronic condition that can involve respiratory tract (other than asthma) treated as prevention with ICS or montelukast from July 2010 Treated with oral steroids during the August 2010 asthma exacerbation one week prior study inclusion
